verses.roman:
cāri-māsa rahilā sabe mahāprabhu-saṅge
jagannāthera nānā yātrā dekhe mahā-raṅge

synonyms: cāri-māsa—four months; rahilā—remain; sabe—all the devotees; mahāprabhu-saṅge—with Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; nānā yātrā—many festivals; dekhe—they see; mahā-raṅge—with great pleasure.
translation: All the devotees remained at Jagannātha Purī for four continuous months, and they observed all Lord Jagannātha's festivals with great pleasure.
